caseTitle: Action on the news clipping published in Daily Pakistan dated 17.04.2013
tagline: The Court, in the matter of action taken regarding unprecedented load shedding in the country, holds that load shedding of electricity in the country is manageable subject to dedicated and committed efforts to ensure the maximum possible generation which is sufficient to cater to the requirements of all categories of consumers and that a formula must be put in place to ensure equitable distribution.
